svg.text: From Physical Infrastructure to Intelligent Applications

g.text: Hardware foundation: GPUs, TPUs, cloud/on-prem servers,
edge computing for low-latency AI (e.g., autonomous vehicles).
Model serving, APIs, MLOps, and LangChain orchestration;
connects AI to business systems (e.g., chatbots, recommendation engines).
Real-time processing via GPUs/TPUs, distributed computing,
and frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, JAX.
Enhances decisions using RAG, knowledge graphs,
and vector search (e.g., GitHub Copilot, search engines).
Model training & optimization: CNNs, RNNs, Transformers,
Transforms raw data: tokenization, embeddings (BERT, Word2Vec),
feature engineering for NLP and computer vision.
User-facing interfaces: ChatGPT, Bard, automation tools,
designed for intuitive interaction and workflow integration.

svg.text: AI Architecture Stack • Hover over layers for interactive details • Each layer represents a critical component in modern AI systems
